name: Mr Henry Banks
wishText: I really Hope you have a great time today man! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday man, Thank you for always being an awesome ally and really just getting me out of the house, appreciate DUUUDE!...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something...
text5Content: You are Special to me Old man
outroText: you deserve to be celebrated always.
replayText: because I'm really glad you exist.
